abd2b07df07a.title: There needs to be a REALLY BIG WALL… a WONDERFUL, MAGNIFICENT WALL….

paragraphs.text: There needs to be a REALLY BIG WALL… a WONDERFUL, MAGNIFICENT WALL…. between the Presidency & personal, family profit. When Trump was explaining about how he told Pres. Xi about the attack on Syria, what did he emphasize more…. the attack… or that AMAZING CHOCOLATE CAKE?…. which was, of course, served in a Trump hotel…. so he was telling how AMAZING…

73b302651b73.title: I know this is far fetched, but I think the Trump children are lucky to be alive.

paragraphs.name: efc0
paragraphs.text: I know this is far fetched, but I think the Trump children are lucky to be alive. Ever consider what the neoliberals did to get to him? Consider that anyone who does not mind using countless Americans as cannon fodder and murdering huge populations in foreign locales does not have a compassionate moral center.

26e32d7a4c2a.title: Sounds to me like they are trying preserve their family’s good name by encouraging their father to…

content.subtitle: Unless there is some kind of policy-oriented advise (dad, please give me a big tax break), I don’t see anything here.

paragraphs.text: Sounds to me like they are trying preserve their family’s good name by encouraging their father to get better advise from his staff (maybe by replacing his staff). Even if they had no big business empire, they should be giving him that advise anyway.

e973153971f8.title: Trump is a crook who is so self-absorbed that he doesn’t even know other people exist.

paragraphs.name: e497
paragraphs.text: Trump is a crook who is so self-absorbed that he doesn’t even know other people exist. There is a law against nepotism, the exact type that his children practice daily. They are all getting richer at the expense of taxpayers and no one is doing anything about it. We just have to pray we survive this tribe of thieves. Wouldn’t it be delish to see them all charged and prosecuted? Dream on.

33cb5c323850.title: Hopefully, Trump supporters will wake up with the epiphany that government is not a business.

paragraphs.name: b930
paragraphs.text: Hopefully, Trump supporters will wake up with the epiphany that government is not a business. Governments are webs of social services that cross with justice systems. Let’s all stop thinking in terms of a for- profit business and shift our ideology towards the notion that governments are here to protect and serve. Therefore governments ought to be altruistic.
